0.1.name: wordpress/enable-posts-order
0.1.description:
Order your posts (similar to the generic order option for pages).

This plugin allows you to sort your posts using a simple drag and drop interface. The option is visible only when entering a certain posts category.

Hey, you can always check my personal page for updates or just to say hi .
